backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining the Kare2U backend with a hardcoded product catalog (9 skincare products across baby/adult categories) and blob storage mixin for asset handling.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping the 'Share Our Site' modal feature to its implementation files (Footer, Header, ShareModal) and associated test ID REQ-11.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference index for the Kare2U frontend codebase.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark theme tokens (colors, borders, sidebar, charts) used by shadcn-ui components.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the Kare2U React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes all page sections (Header, Hero, BrandValues, ProductCatalog, WhyKare2U, BrandStory, Footer) and provides smooth-scroll navigation with tab-switching helpers.
frontend/src/components/BrandStory.tsx: Two-column section presenting Kare2U's origin story with a brand illustration, floating accent cards, a quote overlay badge, and decorative leaf motifs.
frontend/src/components/BrandValues.tsx: Responsive grid section displaying four brand value tiles (Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist-Inspired, Natural Ingredients, Family-Safe) with icons on a soft blue background.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand info, social media icon buttons, navigation links, and a share button that opens a ShareModal. Includes decorative LeafMotif elements and a copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Fixed top navigation header that becomes opaque on scroll, with desktop nav links, a Share button, a Shop Now CTA, and a collapsible mobile menu. Opens a ShareModal on share button click.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Full-width hero section with a background image, decorative leaf motifs, the brand tagline, and two CTA buttons (Shop Baby and Shop Adult) that trigger scroll-to-products callbacks.
frontend/src/components/LeafMotif.tsx: SVG leaf decorative component with configurable color, size, opacity, and rotation props, plus a LeafCluster composite that renders three overlapping leaves.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a single product with its image (or emoji fallback), type label, name, description, price badge, and an Add to Cart button styled with hover/active transitions.
frontend/src/components/ProductCatalog.t: Product listing section with Baby/Adult tabs, fetches all products via useAllProducts hook, renders a responsive grid of ProductCards with skeleton loading states and decorative leaf motifs.
frontend/src/components/ShareModal.tsx: A modal dialog that displays a QR code and copyable URL link for sharing the Kare2U website, using Google Charts API for QR generation and clipboard API for copying.
frontend/src/components/WhyKare2U.tsx: A marketing section component that renders three feature cards (eczema-focused formula, clean ingredients, all ages) explaining the Kare2U brand's value propositions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching all products or products filtered by category from the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind layers, defines Kare2U brand CSS custom properties (oklch colors, radii, shadows), and registers utility classes for fonts and brand colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with Kare2U brand colors (oklch), custom fonts, border radii, box shadows, and animation keyframes, with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the full project state for the Kare2U eczema skincare website, including brand palette, product catalog with names/prices, architectural notes, and a list of implemented features with their IDs and versions.
